data.title: Athenaeum University – Free
data.meta_description: Name of University is Athenaeum University. Choose Study Program, Compare Tuition And Fees and Apply Online to Athenaeum University. Chats online with university admissions officers on official pages of universities.
data.text:
About the university

~ €3,764 / year

Practicing teaching staff Programs include practical training Specialized university

Ateneo University San Pacià was canonically erected on 1 October 2015 in the city of Barcelona, ​​through Cardinal Giuseppe Versaldi, Prefect of the Congregation for Catholic Education, come expressly from Rome to sign ne publicly constitution. The Holy See has agreed thus the request made by Cardinal Lluís Martínez Sistach, Archbishop of Barcelona, ​​Chancellor of the three ecclesiastical faculties that already existed in this city: the Faculty of Theology of Catalonia (1968), the Faculty of philosophy of Catalonia (1990) and the Faculty of Antoni Gaudí Church History, Christian Archeology and Arts (2014). And culminates a process of almost half a century has led to the creation of a powerful university dedicated exclusively to ecclesiastical studies and directly linked to the Church of Barcelona and, through it, with the other dioceses have based in Catalonia.

How to apply to the university

Choose a program

Press “Apply now” button

Send an application form

Complete admissions tasks

Go to study

To apply to Athenaeum University follow these steps. To get more information about the university and the admissions process, you can use the live chat to contact a university representative.

Required documents for admission

When applying for admission to Athenaeum University in Spain you should prepare all required documents. Request a list of necessary documents directly from a university, as it may vary for different countries. Using our live chat, you can also ask for sample documents.

Passport

Supervisor Agreement Form (PhD)

Proof of fee payment

Research proposal outline (MA, PhD)

Health and Life Insurance

Photographs

Student visa

Online Application form

Application fee

Why people choose this university

Practicing teaching staff Programs include practical training Specialized university

Free Apply is not responsible for the content of this page. Through the Site, Free Apply provides an online catalog which you can use to find different types of educational institutions. It’s possible for a new university to be registered by any user, however only verified university representatives will be able to manage, reply in chat and make changes to a university page. Once the University registers its official representative, it has the right to block access for others to edit the information. Further control over the content will be carried out by the representative of the University. Registration with the Free-Apply.com catalog is free.
